class controller.Controller¶

Bases: PySide.QtGui.QWidget

Controller part of the MVC pattern, handles the communication between model and view layers.

__init__()¶

Initializes the controller and sets everything up.

close()¶

Closes the app.

Returns:None
reset()¶

Resets all fields in the GUI

Returns:None
staticMetaObject = <PySide.QtCore.QMetaObject object at 0x05137B70>¶
submit()¶

Calls the Google Maps REST API via a function in the model to find a route to the specified destination and shows the returned values in the GUI.

Returns:None
class model.Model¶

Bases: object

Model part of the MVC pattern, handles the Google Maps Direction API communication.

parseJSON(json_data)¶

Parses the JSON response into an html formatted string and returns it with a status.

Parameters:json_data – the requests JSON response
Returns:tuple with the html formatted string and a status
parseXML(xml_data)¶
requestNavigation(origin, destination, file_format)¶

Calls the Google Maps Directions API and returns a formatted string of the route description abd a status message

Parameters:
  • origin – The origin of the navigation route
  • destination – The destintion of the nagivation route
  • file_format – Format of the API return, “json” or “xml”
Returns:

Tuple of status message and formatted string of the route navigation description
